name: Arena
description: Multiplayer deathmatch games with drones! Enjoy fast multiplayer action with your drone in Deathmatch and Team Deathmatch competitions in exotic arenas.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 Storage: 2 GB available space
